description: Detects a suspicious process spawning from an "mshta.exe" process, which could be indicative of a malicious HTA script execution
author: Michael Haag
name: Suspicious MSHTA Child Process
query: (process.parent.executable.text:"*\\mshta.exe" AND ((process.executable.text:("*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\sh.exe" OR "*\\bash.exe" OR "*\\reg.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\bitsadmin.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("Cmd.Exe" OR "PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll" OR "wscript.exe" OR "cscript.exe" OR "Bash.exe" OR "reg.exe" OR "REGSVR32.EXE" OR "bitsadmin.exe"))))
